website_summaries.verdict: This glass surface won't stain and is also easy on the eyes.
pros: Small in size but provides big impact in terms of resolution and appeal

customer_reviews.title: love everything about it but
customer_reviews.text: love everything about it but, regular magnets aren't strong enough. I had to get extra strong rare earth magnets that are 12 bucks + shipping for 10. But you won't find another board that looks as good as this one. It is Sexy. FYI you can leave the marker tray off (I think it looks better) & hang it vertically.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this Product!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about shipping/handling and if we would be able to mount this item. All went flawlessly. No issues at all. We are going to order more so, I would certainly order this product again and I would certainly recommend this item. Great product, very easy for me to mount this but, I am a contractor and I know it may be beyond other's skills set but, it was very easy for me. It is magnetic, erases well and is a great size. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Installation was tricky and it isn't magnetic enough for normal magnets
customer_reviews.text: Measuring instructions were confusing and we were off about a half-inch which made a huge difference with screwing on the board to the mount. Was able to mount it vertically. Normal magnets don't work, I had to buy special rare earth magnets which hold fine, not the best. Only looks good with black markers.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M. Siegel

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and exquisitely packaged for shipping
customer_reviews.text: have not installed it yet (room still being painted) so cannot speak to that, but the board itself is beautiful. top quality. and the shipping packaging was really terrific -- it showed me that the folks at this company take pride in their work. really carefully done, no way it was going to chip or break without the shipping company trying to do it.
customer_reviews.author: grateful-ted

customer_reviews.title: Great message board
customer_reviews.text: This fit perfect in the area I had in mind. Great for messages and daily reminders.
customer_reviews.author: JeYo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Glass Marker Board
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my office, if you follow the instructions you won't have any problems installing.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: People at my company love it. Works great so far.

customer_reviews.text: Nice Board but not really magnetic You cant put almost anything unless strong mangets

customer_reviews.title: Nice board, very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Nice board, very easy to install, and just as described. I had thought this was also a magnetic board, which it is not, so that is my only disappointment but not a fault of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT Magnetic
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT magnetic. It’s fine as a dry erase board but to say it is magnetic is patently false.
customer_reviews.author: C. Steven Lewis
